title: Podcast 307: How the mind impacts nutrition + quantum physics & how does it relate to our health (with celebrity chef Serena Poon)
description:
Get your tickets to my 2021 Mental Health Retreat: https://www.drleafconference.com

Get a free Cleaning up your Mental Mess workbook when you sign up for my weekly newsletter at drleaf.com


SHOW DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk to celebrity chef, certified nutritionist and Reiki master Serena Poon on dealing with cancer, managing multiple health struggles, how the mind impacts nutrition, quantum physics and more! 

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/how-the-mind-impacts-nutrition-quantum-physics-how-does-it-relate-to-our-health-with-celebrity-chef-serena-poon

For more info on Serena visit: Www.Serenaloves.com


OFFERS FROM OUR SPONSORS:

-AquaTru, my favorite water purifier: Get $100 OFF an AquaTru plus FREE SHIPPING! Just go to AquaTru.com and enter the code DRLEAF at checkout.

-BiOptimizer’s Blood Sugar Breakthrough: For an exclusive offer for my listeners, just go to www.bloodsugarbreakthrough.health/drleaf and save 10% with code DRLEAF10 when you try Blood Sugar Breakthrough.

-Four Sigmatic: Get up to 40% off + Free Shipping on select bundles. To claim this deal you MUST go to Foursigmatic.com/DRLEAF


PODCAST HIGHLIGHTS:

2:15 The power of culinary alchemy

4:40 The relationship between physical & spiritual nutrition

5:10 The different energy centers in the brain & body + why they are important

11:30 What is quantum physics & how does it relate to our health?

12:50 How certain foods support health energy flow

18:50 The power of the mind & how it impacts nutrition

22:05 How to overcome obstacles & setbacks

26:00 Turning challenges into opportunities to help others

34:40 How to help someone who is in a very dark place health-wise

40:45 The healing power of happy memories & gratitude

45:00 How Serena cleans up her mental mess


-Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

-Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app

-Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips. Just text DRLEAF to 1 (833) 285 3747
